DOC.brief_summary: This study protocol randomise clinical trial aim test two material use orthodontic archwire compare FireWire archwires Copper Nickel Titanium ( CNiTi ) archwires . Both professional patient relate outcome measure use fully evaluate performance .
DOC.detailed_description: This randomise clinical trial Firewire CNiTi orthodontic aligning archwires . A two group single blind parallel multicentre study design National Health Service primary care set England use . Patients recruit attend practice orthodontic treatment meet inclusion exclusion criterion . Online randomisation allocate one two group , stratify centre age group ( adolescent / adult ) . Sample size calculation indicate total sample size 42 , allow dropout miss data investigator recruit 64 , 32 group . Patients treat accord strict clinical protocol include customised Damon Q fix appliance define archwire sequence . Participants see initial 5 week interval data collection new archwire placement , otherwise routine 10 week interval . Primary outcome data ( rate alignment ) collect initial 10 week secondary outcome duration treatment ( 18 month approx ) .
DOC.criteria: 12 year age old Class 1 Incisor relationship ( British Standards Institute Classification ) Labial segment crowd upper / low arch > 4mm Little 's Irregularity Index upper / low arch > 4mm Eligible NHS orthodontic treatment Planned nonextraction upper low fix appliance orthodontic treatment Previous fix appliance orthodontic treatment Previous functional appliance treatment Planned use fixed auxiliary appliance ( e.g . quadhelix , Trans Palatal Arch ) Cleft lip palate craniofacial anomaly Hypodontia ( exclude third molar ) , miss teeth due previous extraction Abnormal root morphology pretreatment radiograph Confirmed history nickel allergy A medical history result take analgesic chronic condition Limited mouth open contraindication intraoral scanning
